p.k: We got hits. We got hits from the 80s. And guess what? They don't stop! You're welcome!
Fall in love with 40 of the most romantic hits of the 1980s!
We're powering-up the time machine and going back to celebrate the first years of our MTV lives! This time we land in. 1987!
From Madonna to Duran Duran, Whitney to Prince, we've got memorable song after song from the most amazing 80s legends - all in one playlist!
Check out all of the best hits from one of the biggest decades in music!
We've selected some of the most iconic 80s power ballads ever recorded to play for you right now on MTV 80s!
Get ready because we're bringing you nothing but classic hits and iconic anthems from the 80s!
